head.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files via {{EnvName}}
head.description: Easily integrate {{FileFormatUp}} document merging into your {{EnvNameShort}} projects using {{ProdFullName}}.

header.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: Leverage {{ProdFullName}} to build efficient {{EnvNameShort}} applications that merge and manage {{FileFormatUp}} documents seamlessly.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing solution that supports over 50 file formats, including PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and archives. Effortlessly merge, split, extract, reorder, and delete pages as needed.

more_features.title: Document merging tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} supports more than 50 widely used business file formats, offering extensive document processing capabilities.

feature_1.title: Merge different document formats
feature_1.content: Combine files such as PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and more. Choose specific pages to merge based on your requirements.

feature_2.title: Page manipulation
feature_2.content: Rearrange, delete, or swap pages to organize documents the way you need.

feature_3.title: Adjust page appearance
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle and switch between landscape and portrait orientations for supported formats.

feature_4.title: Extract pages
feature_4.content: Select specific pages and save them as a new file.

formats.title: Merge various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} works with over 50 file formats, enabling smooth document merging and editing.

examples.comment_2: Merge the document with another file
examples.comment_3: Save the merged document to the desired location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) simplifies merging {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Integrate merging functionality into your {{EnvName}} applications and combine multiple files effortlessly.
content.step_1: Specify the path to the first {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Select the second file to merge.
content.step_3: Set additional merge options if needed.
content.step_4: Run the merge operation and save the output file.

code_1.title: Merge files of different formats
code_1.content: This example shows how to merge multiple files of different supported formats into a single document.
code_1.comment_2: Merge it with a Microsoft Word document
code_1.comment_3: Add a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet to the merged document
code_1.comment_4: Save the merged document to the specified location
